section1.title: Don't know where to start?
section1.description: Sign up for a marketing audit and we'll help identify effective solutions for your business.

section2.title: Marketing Company of the Year
section2.description: at The Great Award of the Year 2023!

BusinessResults.title: Results that work for your business
BusinessResults.description: We understand that entrepreneurs need not just ideas, but measurable results - increased leads, customer acquisition, and profit growth.
BusinessResults.subtitle: Our Philosophy
BusinessResults.subdesk: Working for your success by offering strategies that solve your specific business challenges and deliver tangible achievements.

zigzak.title: An approach that makes your brand stand out
zigzak.subdesk1: We analyze the market, study competitors, identify your target audience's characteristics. Together we define promotion goals.
zigzak.subdesk2: Create a unique SMM strategy that differentiates your brand and delivers real results.
zigzak.subdesk3: Creative team: mobile photographer, copywriter and designer develop visuals and texts that attract attention and drive sales.
zigzak.subdesk4: Targeting specialist configures ads to attract your target audience and generate leads.
zigzak.subdesk5: Select opinion leaders to increase reach and brand trust.
zigzak.subdesk6: Project Manager monitors deadlines, team performance, and keeps you informed.
zigzak.subdesk7: Weekly analysis of content and ad performance with improvements for maximum results.

createReklam.title: We create trusted advertising
createReklam.description: Engage bloggers and influencers to make your business accessible to thousands of clients.
createReklam.desk1: analyze influencers, their audience and reputation to maximize campaign results.
createReklam.desk2: analyze influencers, their audience and reputation to maximize campaign results.
createReklam.desk3: measure reach, engagement and conversions to show influencer impact on your business growth.

smm.title: Your personal SMM department of 6 experts
smm.desk1: Coordinates team work, manages timelines, and communicates with you to achieve goals.
smm.desk2: Develops promotion strategies, analyzes audience and competitors, plans content and campaigns.
smm.desk3: Creates dynamic visual content: photos, videos, Reels - everything that captures attention.
smm.desk4: Develops unique visual solutions and graphics to differentiate your brand.
smm.desk5: Writes compelling texts: posts, headlines, product descriptions that drive action.
smm.desk6: Attracts target audience and configures ads for maximum leads and new clients.

banner.title: Don't Miss Customers Ready to Buy Right Now!
banner.description: We set up ads that generate leads from the first day of launch

whyContext.title: Why Contextual Advertising?
whyContext.subdesk1: Your ads are seen by users already interested in your products/services.
whyContext.subdesk2: Control costs by paying only for actual clicks on your ads.
whyContext.subdesk3: Track ad performance through precise analytics.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.subdesk1: We study your niche, competitors, and target audience
howWeWork.subdesk2: Identify keywords that will help clients find you
howWeWork.subdesk3: Write compelling texts and create effective creatives
howWeWork.subdesk4: Launch campaigns on Google Ads and Yandex Direct with precise targeting
howWeWork.subdesk5: Continuously monitor results and implement improvements
howWeWork.subdesk6: Provide regular reports and suggest growth strategies

whySEO.title: Why is SEO optimization essential for your business?
whySEO.content1: Over 70% of users click on the first three search results. Ranking in the top positions increases website traffic without additional advertising costs.
whySEO.content2: Top-ranked websites are perceived as more reliable. This builds customer trust and encourages repeat sales.
whySEO.content3: SEO investments pay off in the long run, unlike paid advertising, which only provides short-term effects.

items.title: Promotional Videos
items.description: Creating a scripted video based on thorough market research allows us to precisely match your business goals and elicit the right response from your target audience. Our promotional videos are designed to attract applications from those who are ready to become your customers.

tags.tag: Precise targeting of the right audience

items.title: Promotional and Corporate Videos
items.description: Promotional videos build trust in your brand, increase customer loyalty, and demonstrate the scope of your company. Our team can handle any challenge, creating videos that reflect your corporate ethos and values.

items.title: Media Content for SMM Promotion
items.description: Creating content for social networks is an art that we master perfectly. Our media content increases the attractiveness of your advertising campaigns and enhances their effectiveness. We offer lucrative package deals integrated into your SMM strategy to maximize audience reach and engagement.

tags.tag: Synergy with your overall marketing strategy

items.title: Shooting Life Events
items.description: We shoot important events and activities: conferences, concerts, forums, and much more. Our report videos preserve the brightest moments and convey the atmosphere of the event, helping you share your achievements and successes with your audience.

tags.tag: Capture the atmosphere and emotion of the event

items.title: Photo Shoot
items.description: Offsite and studio shoots are performed by our experienced photographers, creating spectacular images and providing flawless processing. We offer several types of photo shoots: product, FASHION, portrait, and others to meet any needs of your business.

tags.tag: Variety of formats and styles of photo shoots

Approach.title: Our Approach to Website Creation
Approach.description: We identify the unique characteristics of your brand and create a clear positioning for it. Our creative designs attract attention and retain customers, making your site memorable. We integrate state-of-the-art technology, ensuring your web solution is functional and effective.

items.title: Landing Pages
items.description: Our landing pages are designed with a focus on maximizing conversion rates. We create attractive and modern pages that not only attract attention but also encourage visitors to take action - buying, registering or requesting information.

items.title: Corporate Websites
items.description: Corporate websites from Bold Brands reflect the uniqueness of your business and build customer trust. We create intuitive, responsive and SEO-optimized websites that effectively communicate your values and offerings with easy navigation and attractive design.

items.title: Online Stores
items.description: We create online stores that provide a convenient shopping experience and help increase sales. We use modern e-commerce platforms, guarantee payment security and develop easy-to-use interfaces to keep your customers coming back again.

items.title: UX/UI Design
items.sub_title: Intuitive and unique interface for your website
items.description: Our UX/UI design experts create user-friendly and attractive interfaces to make users feel comfortable interacting with your website. We focus on easy navigation and beautiful design to help retain visitors and increase conversion rates.

MarketingSupport.title: Comprehensive marketing support
MarketingSupport.subtitle: Integrated marketing support is a strategic approach that helps businesses not just to make themselves known, but to achieve real results: increase sales, expand their customer base and strengthen their market position.
MarketingSupport.bottomText: combine all key digital marketing tools into a single ecosystem so that you get the most out of every investment.

WhatWeDo.fText: We analyze your goals, audience and market characteristics, create an effective promotion plan and implement it step-by-step.
WhatWeDo.sText: From SEO and contextual advertising to social media management and e-mail marketing, we select the optimal set of tools to achieve specific KPIs.
WhatWeDo.thText: We create texts, visuals and video content that doesn't just “look pretty”, but works to engage audiences and increase conversions.
WhatWeDo.fourText: We help you set up end-to-end analytics, integrate CRM, and build efficient call center and sales processes to ensure that every lead reaches a deal.
WhatWeDo.fiveText: We track performance at every stage, provide regular reports and make adjustments to improve efficiency and cost transparency.

WhyChoose.title: Why choose Bold Brands:
WhyChoose.fBlockText: Focuses on key metrics: revenue growth, reduced cost of customer acquisition, increased ROI.
WhyChoose.sBlockText: We don't just run ads: we build an entire promotion system to reach audiences at all stages of the sales funnel.
WhyChoose.tBlockText: We react quickly to market changes and optimize strategies to keep you one step ahead of the competition.
WhyChoose.fourBlockText: We use advanced analytics and automation tools, provide transparent statistics and detailed reports to make it easy for you to control your budget and evaluate effectiveness.

ResultsBlock.title: Result
ResultsBlock.text1: A well-organized marketing department working as a well-coordinated mechanism.
ResultsBlock.text2: A clear promotional policy and financial model that allows you to forecast costs and revenues.
ResultsBlock.text3: Подготовленный маркетолог, знающий все тонкости продвижения именно вашего продукта или услуги.
ResultsBlock.text4: A trained marketer who knows the ins and outs of promoting your product or service.
